caption: Privilege Detail
description: The Privilege Detail object describes details about a specific privilege, action, or permission. It captures the privilege name, type, usage status, and when it was last used.
name: privilege_detail

name.description: The name of the privilege, action, or permission. Examples: GetObject, CreateStoreImageTask (AWS); Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/read (Azure); storage.objects.get (GCP).

type.description: The type or category of the privilege. Examples: read, write, execute.

last_used_time.description: The most recent time this privilege was used.

is_unused.description: Indicates whether the privilege is unused within the analysis timeframe.
